subject: Officiating (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. has directed referees to be stricter about violations of Rule 64, which penalizes blatant diving or embellishment after an infraction.
snippet: The N.H.L. has directed referees to be stricter about violations of Rule 64, which penalizes blatant diving or embellishment after an infraction.
